pkgmetadata.longdescription: # sphinxext-deltaSphinx extension to generate a page of changed articles on ReadTheDocs.## Installation```python -m pip install sphinxext-delta```## Requirements- Sphinx >= 2- ReadTheDocs- GitHubNo other environments are supported.## UsageAdd `sphinxext.delta` to your extensions list in your `conf.py````extensions = [ sphinxext.delta,]```## OptionsThere are 2 required and 1 optional configurations:- `delta_doc_path` - REQUIRED: Relative path to your articles. IE: `source/docs`- `delta_inject_location` - OPTIONAL: Relative location for the toctree to be injected. Defaults to `master_doc`.
